name: Pigivania
description:
Left - A
Right - D
Jump - Space
Jump down - S + Space
Attack - Enter 
Interact - S
Menu - M

Quick prototype we threw together for a mini jam with our Local GameDev meetup.
Assets from Pixel Frog's Kings and Pigs.

Has a boss fight!
Teleport rooms!
Functioning save room!
Fake lights!
More!
